annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 9, 1983, D.C. Law 4-167, § 2(e), 29 DCR 4983

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Proposed rules approved: Pursuant to Resolution 5-387, the “Minority Business Opportunity Commission Rules Approval Resolution of 1983”, effective October 18, 1983, the Council approved the proposed rules of the District of Columbia Minority Business Opportunity Commission transmitted by the Mayor on July 1, 1983.
